# Definitions

# Definition Of Done

* Pull request has been created and is not a draft
* Code is complete
* Code has been reviewed by atleast one other team member
* AI code review has been discussed
  * AI being wrong is normal, but it has to atleast been given some thought
* Linter clompetes without errors
* Autobuilds / Autodeploy completes without errors
  * The automatically generated deployment is functioning and has been tested by one other member
* There are no known bugs

# Definition Of Ready

* PBI is clear to every member
* PBI is small and focused
* PBI is estimated
* PBI has acceptance criteria
* Acceptance critera are clear to every member
* PBI adds value to the project
